group_1.narration: Though I was new to Kamihama,@I was offered guidance by Kako Natsume,@a Magical Girl.
She was familiar with my work as an author,@which I was certainly happy about, but...

group_1.textRight: ...There's been quite the increase in Witches here,@lately.
Perhaps it has something to do with the Witch@you were chasing, Misaki-sensei...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I wonder...@What do you think, Kako?

group_1.textRight: Oh no, Misaki-sensei! I could hardly press my opinion@on you. I'm your junior, after all...
I can hardly theorize like the protagonists of your@detective novels, either...

group_1.textLeft: You... don't have to call me "Misaki-sensei".
I'm just the Magical Girl Umika Misaki right now,@and you're the one offering me help.

group_1.textRight: Oh, goodness no! It's no trouble at all, really...

group_1.textLeft: Also, I'm actually rather uncomfortable being called@"sensei" unless it's a joke.
It's even part of a promise I made with my editor...
Yes, that's perfect! Once again, I'm very glad@to meet you, Kako.

group_1.narration: And thus, Kako and I began searching@for Kazumi and Kaoru.

group_1.textRight: All right, you just wait here a moment.@I'll bring us some tea.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Wait...! I thought we were going to discuss@the search.
(Tea, of all things? We don't have any time to@sit and relax...)

group_1.textRight: Sorry to keep you waiting, Umika!@You drink coffee, right?
You mentioned in the afterword of "Magical Girl@Detective" that you drink it all the time...

group_1.textLeft: Kako... I appreciate your generosity, but we're@racing against the clock, here.

group_1.textRight: Yes! So you'd better drink your coffee while you@still can, right?

group_1.textLeft: Look, I HAVE to be searching for my missing friends@right now...!

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry... it's just that none of my friends answered@my calls yet.
I thought that some of my fellow Magical Girls@might've seen Kazumi or Kaoru.
So I tried phoning each of them...
But it seems they're all busy right now, and none@of them picked up.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry for raising my voice like that...@I didn't know.

group_1.textRight: It's fine, really! But would it be all right to wait for@just a moment right now?

group_1.textLeft: I certainly can't ignore such wonderful-smelling@coffee, either.

group_1.textRight: This coffee is actually a secret menu item of ours.@We only serve it to our regular customers.
